website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight bat for young players that features a larger barrel at 2-5/8 inches.
pros: Bat made for ages 9 and under with a -11 drop weight
Unlike many bats made for really young players, this model has a bigger-than-average barrel size
Extremely lightweight bat that can help coach-pitch or t-ball players to learn to swing the bat properly without developing bad habits
Larger barrel allows kids to make more consistent contact
cons: May not stand up well to regulation baseballs
works better with soft safety balls

customer_reviews.title: many good hits--no dings or dents
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 8 year old in kid pitch. Has been used in many batting practices and in a number of games with many, many good hits--no dings or dents. The last bat we purchased had a few after just a couple of games, so I would say the quality of this bat is great!
customer_reviews.author: kate cross

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with the Easton Incrediball SofTouch 10" Softball, a great combo for playing softball with my 7 and 9 year old grandchildren on our property.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bat!
customer_reviews.text: This bat is great. It gave my 6 year old confidence at the plate; good pop off the bat and the big barrel expands the sweet spot and improves contact rate. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Dents easily
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 7 year old son who plays in a Pinto league (PONY coach pitch). We had hit a few of the Total Control Balls at the house with it, but he dented it the very first time he hit in the batting cage with it. Obviously being coach pitch, it's not like the coach was pitching very hard either. This bat just wasn't durable at all. See attached pic. The dent is on the left side and is considerably worse than I was able to capture with my camera. No umpire would allow this in a game.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: POS. 8yr old son dented this bat in his first use. Off of coach pitch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Power hitter
customer_reviews.text: This bat is awesome! My son when from a 2 1/2" barrel to this and he has consistently been hitting extra bases. That small difference made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The boomstick! Kid didn't strike out a single time this season.
customer_reviews.author: BillyDoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bat, my son’s first season of coach pitch. He’s rocking the ball left and right.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a good diameter size for where he is at now in his batting.
customer_reviews.author: mrs doe

customer_reviews.title: The bat was dented the first time my son was ...
customer_reviews.text: The bat was dented the first time my son was in the batting cage. I wish i had read the reviews about this happening to other's before wasting my money. The bat is unusable for games now.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Dented after batting.
customer_reviews.text: Bat is dented. After less than a month of use by a 7 year old, we are very disappointed that there is now a dent in it from batting. It’s past the return window, so we can’t return or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany D.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 hit
customer_reviews.text: 1 hit off a 35 mph machine from my 7 year old son left a massive dent in the barrel. At least return process was smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Grohman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MI SON LOVED HIS BAT ALMOST HIT 2 HOME RUNS WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bat for my 7 year old since his very petit
customer_reviews.author: Griselda Ordaz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bar. The ball just flies off it
customer_reviews.author: Zuberi R.

customer_reviews.title: Still has great pop. Big barrels are the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 yr old. Would have given it 5 stars but it got a large dink in it only after a few games and 2 days at the batting cages. Luckily it is at the lower end of the barrel. Still has great pop. Big barrels are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Steve wilson

customer_reviews.title: Prone to dents!
customer_reviews.text: Very weak bat. Received on a Friday and after taking 15 pitches off the machine 32-34 mph) it had a massive dent. The person behind the bat was my 5 yr old who weighs 42 lbs. Bat came with a one year warranty and Amazon backed and sent a new bat immediately but after 4 pitches today it dented twice. Weather was in the 70's both days. Go with Easton S3 bat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bat at an amazing price. Perfect for my Son who plays in the PONY system.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two Boys

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery, awesome bat my son plays pony league and this has help develop his batting skills
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bang for your buck. -11 bat with big barrel cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M.

product_meta.title: EASTON JBB16S400 S400, 2 5/8" BARREL DIAMETER, -11 LENGTH TO WEIGHT RATIO, SENIOR LEAGUE/YOUTH BIG BARREL BASEBALL BAT
product_meta.description: The Junior big barrel 8033578 of Easton's S400 speed Brigade features Aircraft alloy for a fast swing speed.
feature_bullets: 7046 aircraft alloy for fast swing speed
